column2:
"He just took out those DOLLS...
like they were nothing..."

"Guren's like... How do I put it...
He's on a totally different level, huh."

"When the Commander gets serious, I'd say
he's on the same level as your city's leader, Crawford."

"Indeed... Though, it has been quite
some time since I've seen him fight."

"Oh, that reminds me. There's
been something on my mind for a while."

"Back in Central Tower, when Guren showed up on the screen,
Crawford was acting... strange, wasn't he?"

"Do they have, like...
some history or something?"
